夷.definition: non-Han people, esp. to the East of China; barbarians; to wipe out; to exterminate; to tear down; to raze

夷平.definition: to level; to raze to the ground

夷洲.definition: name of an ancient barbarian country, possibly Taiwan

夷為平地.definition: to level; to raze to the ground

夷狄.definition: non-Han tribes in the east and north of ancient China; barbarians

夷門.definition: the Yi gate of 大梁, capital of Wei 魏 during Warring states

夷陵.definition: Yiling, ancient name of Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1]; Yiling, a district of Yichang city 宜昌市[Yi2 chang1 shi4], Hubei

夷陵區.definition: Yiling district of Yichang city 宜昌市[Yi2 chang1 shi4], Hubei
